statements: SELECT * FROM student_participation ORDER BY student_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT forum_name, post_count FROM student_participation WHERE post_count > 10;
SELECT student_id, forum_name, last_post_date FROM student_participation WHERE last_post_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY last_post_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM student_participation WHERE post_count BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT forum_name, COUNT(forum_name) AS total_posts FROM student_participation GROUP BY forum_name HAVING total_posts > 3 ORDER BY total_posts DESC;
SELECT student_id, forum_name, post_count, last_post_date FROM student_participation
SELECT student_id, forum_name, post_count, last_post_date FROM student_participation WHERE post_count > 10 ORDER BY last_post_date DESC
SELECT student_id, forum_name, post_count, last_post_date FROM student_participation WHERE forum_name = 'Discussion Forum' ORDER BY student_id ASC
SELECT student_id, COUNT(*) AS total_posts FROM student_participation GROUP BY student_id HAVING total_posts > 20 ORDER BY total_posts DESC
SELECT forum_name, AVG(post_count) AS avg_posts FROM student_participation GROUP BY forum_name HAVING avg_posts > 5 ORDER BY avg_posts DESC
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_id, student_name, student_email FROM Students WHERE registration_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ForumPosts ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT student_name, post_content FROM Students JOIN ForumPosts ON Students.student_id = ForumPosts.student_id;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Students WHERE registration_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT post_content FROM ForumPosts WHERE post_date < '2021-09-01' ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT student_name, student_email, post_content FROM Students JOIN ForumPosts ON Students.student_id = ForumPosts.student_id WHERE Students.student_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE student_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT student_name, post_content, post_date FROM Students JOIN ForumPosts ON Students.student_id = ForumPosts.student_id WHERE post_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, email FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT forum_name, category FROM forums ORDER BY forum_id DESC;
SELECT student_name, post_text FROM students JOIN posts ON students.student_id = posts.student_id;
SELECT forum_name, post_time FROM forums JOIN posts ON forums.forum_id = posts.forum_id WHERE forum_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, email FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT forum_name, category FROM forums WHERE category = 'Science' ORDER BY forum_name ASC;
SELECT student_name, post_text FROM students JOIN posts ON students.student_id = posts.student_id WHERE posts.forum_id = 2;
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_students FROM students;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_id, name FROM Students WHERE student_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM Courses WHERE instructor = 'John Doe';
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM Posts ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT student_id, comment_content FROM Comments WHERE comment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM Courses WHERE instructor = 'John Doe';
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM Posts WHERE post_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT student_id, name, email FROM Students WHERE student_id IN (SELECT student_id FROM Posts WHERE course_id = '12345');
SELECT student_id, count(comment_id) FROM Comments GROUP BY student_id HAVING count(comment_id) > 5 ORDER BY count(comment_id) DESC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT name, age FROM students WHERE age > 20;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM courses ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT thread_title, created_at FROM forum_threads WHERE course_id = 3;
SELECT content FROM forum_posts WHERE thread_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE age > 20
SELECT name, email FROM students WHERE major = 'Computer Science'
SELECT course_name, credits FROM courses WHERE credits > 3 ORDER BY course_name DESC
SELECT thread_title, last_updated FROM forum_threads WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01'
SELECT s.name, c.course_name, g.grade FROM students s JOIN grades g ON s.id = g.student_id JOIN courses c ON g.course_id = c.id
